snippet.title: Zombie Soup Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Playable Early Demo at #itch.io :  https://aeonsparx.itch.io/zombiesoup 
Download Playable Early Demo at #Gamejolt :  https://gamejolt.com/games/zombiesoup/441270
Add to Steam Wishlist : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1095290/Zombie_Soup

*Fast Pace Action Adventure Game*
ZombieSoup is a retro action shooter adventure game following the fate of a kid to shoot, loot and dodge tool his way to save a girl from the evil lurking in the dark.
You are Ricky, a college kid on backpack seeking his own adventures out in the country. On an ordinary night Ricky woke up on a long journey to a small town. Soon he discovered that the town has been infested by zombies and monsters.

Platforms :
#PC, #Mac & #Steam OS (#Linux)

Zombie Soup official website:   http://zombie-soup.com
Like Zombie Soup on Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/zombiesoupgame/
Follow Zombie Soup on Twitter:   https://twitter.com/zombiesoupgame
Follow Zombie Soup on Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/aeonsparx/
Join Discord:   https://discordapp.com/invite/5fPVqqa

#indiegames #UE4 #UnrealEngine
